arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach trump Hoffenheim in enthralling 2-1 victory
arts.sum: Goals from Philipp Sander, Alassane Pléa and Andrej Kramarić punctuated an action-packed match, with Gladbach's incisive play and ruthless finishing overcoming Hoffenheim's possession-based dominance. Hoffenheim and Gladbach players observe a minute's silence before kick-off.

arts.ttl: Hoffenheim vs Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Hosts look to create breathing room
arts.sum: Hoffenheim aim to create some breathing room from the Bundesliga relegation zone as they host Borussia Mönchengladbach at the PreZero Arena on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Nuri Şahin questioned mentality of Borussia Dortmund following their 1-1 draw with Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that after Borussia Dortmund’s late 1-1 draw with Hoffenheim on Sunday, head coach Nuri Şahin questioned the mentality of his side. Following Jacob Bruun Larsen’s late equalise, Şahin…

arts.ttl: Preview: Hoffenheim vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Hoffenheim and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
